This Game is great! But not for everybody! 

Do you like horror? Competitive play? Do you like grinding? And can you live with some toxic player? Then this game is perfect for you. 

Pro´s:
-Many classics like Freddy Krüger , Micheal Myers, Leatherface and even the Demogorgon.
-Many diffrent options to play the game (sneaky , casual , trolly , toxic , aggressiv etc. The many many diffrent perks allows thousand of options.
-extreme good support , many new stuff like maps , killer , suvs or balance changes. 
-customize options
-you can play with friends or against friends at own lobbys.
-a good lvl system with many rewards like bloody customize or perks.
-grindy, you can play decedes and still have things you play for (like new perks or prestige)

Con´s:
-Grindy, not everybody likes that.
-you cant get all killers with playing (license killers need real money)
-Sometimes very toxic player.
-bugs. Glad not game breaking but still frustrating sometimes.

If you like Horror , competitive and grindy play, fun with friends or alone and a game with much support then Dead by Daylight is THAT Horror Multiplayer Game for you!

Overall, fun game to play, especially with friends. Just be aware that there is plenty of salt in this community. This game is still very sided in favor of the killer, regardless of what you may find on Reddit. Play both sides, they each have their own unique style of play. Plenty of bugs and the game isn't balanced, but the devs do actively work on updating the game even though it's 4 years old.

Honestly, the base game idea is amazing and I have over 250 hours on the game. The game is great overall. But, recently the game has been a crap hole and has been a lot less fun. The hit boxes at this point are almost non-existent and the matchmaking is completely broken. Also, the developers don't listen to the community at all. I love to play the game and it's a really cool concept, but the game could be so much better if the developers listened to the community. The ranking system is also very broken. I recently played a game and did more than my friend and I lost a rank and he gained one. If you want the game, I say buy it, but the game still feels like it is in development.

Edit: I am now at almost the 750 hour mark and the game has gotten a lot better. The hitboxes have gotten to a point to where if you get a BS hit, it is because of ping. However, with the new skill based matchmaking, the game has gotten a lot less fun. I like to be a survivor that has fun and memes the match, but still tries to win. I would say I'm above average on the skill tree, but even then, the game just now feels like a sweat fest. I have been going up against killers with over 3000 hours of gameplay and it feels like people are taking this like it means their rank is on the line (De-piping is not possible anymore exept if you disconnect). I just feel like the game has gotten boring after repeatedly getting killers that are rank 1. I feel like I have to try every match now because that is the only chance that I can actually play the game.

I like the mechanics of how each match goes whether it is at the survivor perspective or the killer's. It makes sense to have working generators in order for a powered gate to open. It is not like any other game I have played. The competitive aspect of the game with the ranked system is fun too when you have a good crowd in group. Even though you cannot choose to do ranked or a regular game, you do have the option of just not worrying about ranked and play for fun while still trying your best. It pushes you to want to play best as you need to work together as a team to get out. Also, the lore behind the characters is very interesting as well.

Playing as the killer was the most cancer experience I ever had. Won't bother spending a cent in this game until fundamental aspects of this game are changed. I felt like I was being ganged up upon or bullied, not to mention that winning with one kill or two, doesn't even remotely feel like a win but rather like a half-assed participation prize. How the devs allow this to happen is beyond me, and furthermore, failure by their part to balance the game in a less frustrating manner shows the extend of their incompetence. I would never think of playing this game after a day of hard work to relax, ever again.

Now where to start with this game. I don't think I've ever loved and hated a game equally as much as Dead By Daylight.

At its core the concept and execution of Dead By Daylight is fresh and unique, no match is ever the same and when you have a good match it's hella entertaining and intense. But the major issue here is it's community. The toxicity can be outright unbearable. How others play can directly effect whether you enjoy the game or not, and unfortunately more often than not you'll find people that have zero interest in whether you have a good time. You have to have a thick skin and care very little about how others treat you when playing this as you'll just have a miserable time if not.

It is thoroughly enjoyable to play with friends though, and after swf-ing with some awesome people I find it borderline unbearable to solo queue. But throughout all my complaints about this game, including the toxicity, glitches, latency issues and particular gameplay strats, I keep coming back because it's downright addictive. Learning how to handle a chase has been possibly the hardest thing I've had to learn gameplay wise but the reward and rush when you pull off a good play, honestly there's nothing like it.


Let's see how I feel when I hit 2000 hours...

因为看了差评里的问题，所以购买的时候还会有点担心，但买了后发现这游戏也没出现差评上所描述的那些问题（至少我玩起来没啥问题）
我还试了下，在不开游戏加速器的情况下玩是什么游戏体验：进去的时候延迟了四五秒左右，刚刚进游戏前三秒左右会有点延迟，隔一会就不会了。
屠夫匹配比求生者匹配速度相对来说慢很多，可能是玩屠夫的人多的原因导致。求生者匹配1~10秒的速度、屠夫30~60秒左右。
游戏里有一些小细节做的不够好，有些屠夫开柜子抓人/背人的时候会穿模。

jogo horrivel totalmente desbalanceado tenq jogar 500 horas de sobrevivente pra conseguir fugir de um killer com 2 horas de jogo, fora que nao tem nem chat de voz pra se comunicar com os outros sobreviventes, demora 1 ano pra fazer gerador, se curar, pular janelas, isso quando vc nao trava no mapa com as porcaria q os desenvolvedor ponhe de sacanagem pra atrapalhar ai vc tenq correr pra frente e olhar pra traz ao mesmo tempo pra ver onde o killer ta, enquanto ele vai igual um cachorro atras de vc, e nao tem nenhum tipo de perk que atrapalhe o killer, o jogo é feito totalmente em torno do killer nao tem nenhuma vantagem pra quem joga de sobrevivente, eu so jogo essa bosta ai pq n tem outro melhor pra jogar nesse estilo
